roleset.name: generally garbage (bad)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Any thoughts please on what you grown ups do for January birthdays when the weather is rubbish and your friends are working .

roleset.name: unskilled at

example.name: both args
example.text: He might be good at dancing, but he was rubbish at scrabble!

roleset.name: very unbeneficial, unhealthy

example.name: Atkins in the age of telegraph
example.text: Bread is rubbish for you full stop, replace it with veggies.
